tags.name: Notification Service
tags.description: INTERNAL API - for managing user subscriptions and sending notifications about new parliamentary protocols

post.description: Creates a new subscription for a user to receive notifications about new parliamentary protocols. Users can subscribe with their email and specify notification preferences.

400.description: Invalid subscription request or email already subscribed

post.description: Triggers notifications to all subscribers about new plenary protocols. This endpoint processes notifications asynchronously and returns immediately. Typically called by the data fetching service when new protocols are available.

202.description: Notification processing started successfully. Notifications will be sent asynchronously.

get.description: Returns the health status of the notification service

200.description: Service is healthy and ready to process notifications

delete.description: Removes all subscriptions for a given email address. This will stop all notifications for the user.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address to unsubscribe from all notifications

400.description: Email not found or unsubscribe failed

SubscriptionRequest.description: Subscription details including email and notification preferences

NotificationRequest.description: Notification request containing the IDs of new plenary protocols
